00090     protected function generateJavascript( $sTargetSelector = null, $arOptions = null, $sInsertBeforeOptions = null )
00091     {
00092         //  Get the options...
00093         if ( $arOptions ) $this->mergeOptions( $arOptions );
00094         $_sId = $this->getId();
00095 
00096         //  Make options
00097         $_oData = $this->getOption( 'data', array(), true );
00098         $this->unsetOption('name');
00099         $this->unsetOption('id');
00100         $_sOptions = $this->makeOptions();
00101         if ( $_oData ) $this->setOption( 'data', $_oData->getValue() );
00102 
00103         //  Jam something in front of options?
00104         if ( null != $sInsertBeforeOptions ) $_sOptions = $sInsertBeforeOptions . ( ! empty( $_sOptions ) ? ', ' . $_sOptions : '' );

00134     public static function loadScripts( $oWidget = null, $sTheme = null )
00135     {
00136         static $_bLoaded = false;
00137 
00138         if ( ! $_bLoaded )

00143             $_oWidget = ( null == $oWidget ) ? new CPSEnhanceJS() : $oWidget;
00144

00146             $_sOldPath = $_oWidget->baseUrl;
00147             $_oWidget->baseUrl = $_oWidget->extLibUrl . self::PS_EXTERNAL_PATH;

00149             $_oWidget->pushScriptFile( $_oWidget->baseUrl . '/js/jQuery.tree.js' );
00150             $_oWidget->pushCssFile( $_oWidget->baseUrl . '/css/enhanced.css' );
00151 
00152             //  And mark completed...
00153             $_bLoaded = true;
